CustomField.description: The date a new merchant portal invite was accepted. This will be the date on the 'CSSO - Fulfilled' platform event date, or, if the user already has access to CSSO, then this will be the date of the first successful onboarding request.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date a new merchant portal invite was accepted. This will be the date on the CSSO - Fulfilled platform event date, or, if the user already has access to CSSO, then this will be the date of the first successful onboarding request.
CustomField.label: Merchant Portal Invite Accepted Date
